Head: Bald spots
Corrosive itching of scalp
Whirling vertigo, with flickering before eyes
Plica polonica
Spots on scalp, oozing moisture, matting hair together
Tearing pain in vertex, ringing and whistling in ears
Irresistible desire to scratch
Nose: Seborrhoea upper lip and base of nose
Female: Menorrhagia; continuous flow, particularly at climacteric
Skin: Eczema of head and face; pustules, itching, burning, and offensive odor
Great sensitiveness of skin, with redness and soreness from slight rubbing

name: Vinca minor
details: A remedy for skin affections, eczema, and especially plica polonica; also for hemorrhages and diphtheria.
